mapper.select: select times, cast(sum(con) as unsigned) con from ( select times, count(*) con from ( select customer, count(customer) as times from settlementnew where shopid = #{shopid} and settlementnew.createtime between #{start} and #{end} group by customer order by times) t group by times having times < 5 union all select 5 times, count(*) from ( select times, count(*) con from (select customer, count(customer) as times from settlementnew where shopid = #{shopid} and settlementnew.createtime between #{start} and #{end} group by customer order by times) t group by times having times >= 5 ) tt union select 1 times,0 con union select 2 times,0 con union select 3 times,0 con union select 4 times,0 con)tt group by times

select cc.name, round(IFNULL(ca.times,0),2) times,IFNULL(ca.xianjin,0) xianjin,round(IFNULL(ca.shicao,0),2) shicao,IFNULL(ca.rentou,0) rentou from ( select count(customer) times, sum(money) xianjin, sum(money1) shicao, count(distinct customer) rentou, shopid from ( select times, money, '0' as money1, shopid,customer from settlementnew where createtime between #{start} and #{end} and consumptioncategory in ('现金产品', '现金卡', '现金实操') and shopid in (select shopid from shop where brandid = #{brandid}) union all select '0' as times , '0' as money , money as money1 , shopid,customer from settlementnew where createtime between #{start} and #{end} and consumptioncategory in ('卡扣产品', '卡扣实操', '现金产品', '现金实操', '赠送实操') and shopid in (select shopid from shop where brandid = #{brandid})) a group by shopid) ca right join ( select c.id, c.name from user c where c.id in (select shopid from shop where brandid = #{brandid}) ) cc on ca.shopid = cc.id

select settlementid, customer, projectname, money, consumptionpattern, a.name name1, b.name name2, c.name name3, d.name name4 from settlementnew left join staff a on a.staffid = settlementnew.beautician1 left join staff b on b.staffid = settlementnew.beautician2 left join staff c on c.staffid = settlementnew.beautician3 left join staff d on d.staffid = settlementnew.beautician4 where settlementnew.shopid=#{shopid} and examine = 0
